title: Milvus Sizing Tool
content: A tool for estimate the resources required to set up Milvus based on your dataset.
tooltip: Note: all the recommendations are calculated based on our lab data, you should adjust it with your own testing before deploying to production. If you have any question, please <0>contact us</0>.
